questions.text: Is anyone chasing you for money?
questions.statement: Someone is chasing you for money

questions.text: Do you have payments due or unpaid accounts? E.g. phone / Work and Income / Cash converters / power bills / car loan / gyms
questions.statement: You have payments due or unpaid accounts

questions.text: Have you recently had any problems with a product or item you've bought?
questions.statement: You have a problem with a product you've bought

questions.text: Have you recently had any problems with a service you've bought?
questions.statement: You have had a problem with a service you've bought

questions.text: Do you have any unpaid fines?
questions.statement: You have unpaid fines

questions.text: Have you recently received an eviction notice?
questions.statement: You have recently been given an eviction notice

questions.text: Was your tenancy bond lodged and/or returned?
questions.statement: Your bond has not been lodged or returned

questions.text: Have you been able to pick up all your belongings?
questions.statement: You have not been able to pick up all your belongings

questions.text: Do you have any unpaid rent?
questions.statement: You have unpaid rent

questions.text: Do you have any problems with your landlord or flatmates?
questions.statement: You have problems with your landlord or flatmates

questions.text: Do you have any problems with your neighbours?
questions.statement: You have problems with your neighbours

questions.text: Are you or do you want to apply for government or community housing?
questions.statement: You would like to apply for government or community housing

questions.text: Do you have a Notice to Appear, or are you due in Court?
questions.statement: You have a Notice to Appear, or are due in Court

questions.text: Have you or a family member had contact with the police you would like to discuss?
questions.statement: You'd like to discuss contact you or a family member has had with the police

questions.text: Are you receiving the appropriate Work and Income benefits?
questions.statement: You are having problems with Work and Income

questions.text: Would you like to change or review any of these arrangements?
questions.statement: You would like to review or change your Work and Income benefits

questions.text: The safety of yourself or your children?
questions.statement: You have concerns about the safety of yourself and or your children

questions.text: Arrangements, plans or orders about children? (e.g. who the child/ren live with, spend time with, or your involvement in major long-term issues)
questions.statement: You would like to discuss arrangements, plans or orders about children in your life

questions.text: Any concerns about Child Youth and Family and your whānau?
questions.statement: You have concerns about  CYFS (Oranga Tamariki) and your whānau

questions.text: Your rights in any personal relationship, including divorce or separation?
questions.statement: You want to know about your rights in any personal relationship, including divorce or separation

questions.text: Concerns about your experiences as a child, while you were in the care of adults or institutions?
questions.statement: You have concerns about your experiences as a child, while you were in the care of adults or institutions

questions.text: Are you having any problems at work?
questions.statement: You are having problems at work

questions.text: Are you worried about getting fired, laid off, or having your hours cut?
questions.statement: You are worried about losing your job or having your hours cut

questions.text: Does your employer owe you money?
questions.statement: Your employee owes you money

questions.text: Do you feel like you have been treated unfairly due to your gender, ethnicity, religion etc.?
questions.statement: You are being discriminated against

questions.text: Do you have concerns around your immigration status in New Zealand?
questions.statement: You have concerns about your immigration status in NZ

questions.text: Are you having trouble bringing family members to New Zealand?
questions.statement: You are having trouble bringing family members to NZ

questions.text: Are you worried about how your child is being treated at school?
questions.statement: You are worried about how your child is being treated at school
